page.title: 03FARMER'S YEAR Cambs/Essex
page.content: Spring:Plant sugar beet,peas,spring- barley and potatoes. Apply nitrogen based fertiliser. Keep crops free from pests and diseases. Begin silage making. Summer:Haymaking,spraying against pests. July:Harvest oil seed rape and grain crops. Autumn:Clear fields,plough/cultivate ground. Sow oil seed rape,winter wheat,winter barley and a small amount of winter oats. Harvest sugar beet. October:Spray autumn planted crops against weeds. Winter:Building and machinery mainten- ance when cold and wet. Early lambs in January,often inside.
